name: Citizen
desc: An ordinary commoner.

name: Lord
desc: The princess of Renais. A sword fighter on an important mission.

name: Great Lord
desc: Mounted lords whose fine qualities set them apart from their peers.

name: Lord
desc: The prince of Renais. A spear fighter on an important mission.

name: Great Lord
desc: Mounted lords whose fine qualities set them apart from their peers.

name: Dancer
desc: Dancers whose dances revitalize their allies.

name: Myrmidon
desc: Talented swordsmen skilled in swift killing strokes.

name: Swordmaster
desc: Lightning-fast swordsmen of peerless and lethal skill.

name: Mercenary
desc: Professional soldiers for hire. Well-balanced, with superior abilities all around.

name: Hero
desc: Seasoned veteran with remarkable skill.

name: Thief
desc: Expert in stealth and subterfuge. Possess weak attacks but many other skills.

name: Assassin
desc: Masters of the killing arts.

name: Rogue
desc: Knaves who need no tools or keys to open locks.

name: Recruit
desc: Unproven knights with dreams of glory.

name: Soldier
desc: Average soldiers possessing no special abilities.

name: Cavalier
desc: Mounted knights with superior movement.

name: Paladin
desc: A title earned only by those cavaliers whose lives have been dedicated to justice.

name: Great Knight
desc: Veteran horse knights.

name: Peg. Knight
desc: Knights who soar through the skies.

name: Falcoknight
desc: Veteran pegasus knights.

name: Knight
desc: Heavily armored knights with poor movement.

name: General
desc: Knights of great skill.

name: Journeyman
desc: Young fighters with high expectations.

name: Fighter
desc:
Ruffians with great strength but
poor defense.

name: Warrior
desc: Determined fighters who relish battle.

name: Pirate
desc: Untrained but fanatical combatant.

name: Berserker
desc: Devotees of the axe. Relentless savages that deliver devastating stikes.

name: Brigand
desc: Ruffians with a strong offense but poor defense.

name: Archer
desc: Lightly armored soldiers armed with bows. Can attack from a distance.

name: Sniper
desc: Devotees of the bow. Possess incredible range.

name: Ranger
desc: Fighters skilled in both sword and bow.

name: Monk
desc: Users of light magic with high resistance.

name: Cleric
desc: Members of the clergy who wield sacred staves to aid allies.

name: Bishop
desc: Mages gifted with visions of the future.

name: Pupil
desc: Mages in training with lofty aspirations.

name: Mage
desc: Curious practioners of anima magic.

name: Sage
desc: Advanced wielders of the natural magics.

name: Shaman
desc: Impulsive mages with a tenous grasp on their magic.

name: Druid
desc: Wielders of deep and ancient magic.

name: Summoner
desc: Master sorcerers who summon fighters.

name: Mage Knight
desc: Knights trained in both anima and staves.

name: Troubadour
desc: Maidens who wield staves from horseback.

name: Valkyrie
desc: Battle maidens who wield both staves and light magic.

name: Wyvern Rider
desc: High-flying knights only vulnerable to bows and magic.

name: Wyvern Lord
desc: Wyvern-mounted knights of superior skill.

name: Wyvern Knight
desc: Wyvern riders who can pierce enemy defenses.

name: Necromancer
desc: Master of the Dark Stone who uses dark magic to command corpses.

name: Revenant
desc:
Walking corpses that move slowly
but attack with sharp claws.

name: Entombed
desc:
Reanimated corpses. They're not fast,
but their talons rend flesh with ease.

name: Bonewalker
desc: Dead warriors given will by dark magic.

name: Wight
desc: Skeletons driven by terrible magic.

name: Bonewalker
desc: Dead warriors given will by dark magic.

name: Wight
desc: Skeletons driven by terrible magic.

name: Mogall
desc:
Perilous floating orbs filled with
blighting dark magic.

name: Arch Mogall
desc: Mogall whose dread power exceeds that of their lesser cousins.
